cfpContent.title: WBO25 – Workshop on Big Optimization
cfpContent.locationDate:
31 July – 1 August 2025 | Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, University of Catania, Italy
Website: web.dmi.unict.it
cfpContent.intro: The focus of WBO25 is on the challenges and opportunities that arise in solving large-scale and highly complex optimization problems. The workshop will feature plenary talks, technical sessions, and networking opportunities to foster collaboration and innovation within the scientific and industrial communities.
cfpContent.topicsOfInterest: Topics of Interest: heuristics and metaheuristics, large-scale optimization, AI in optimization, scalable methodologies and frameworks, and various applications in sectors such as energy, logistics, healthcare, network design, and supply chain.
cfpContent.submissionInfo:
Submission Information
Proposals must be written in English and follow the workshop's formatting guidelines (available on the website). Submissions are made through the online platform: [Submission URL].
cfpContent.proceedingsInfo:
Proceedings & Special Issue
Accepted papers will be published in the workshop proceedings, and a selection may be considered for a Special Issue in an indexed journal.
